name: Indian Institute of Technology Madras
desc: Established in 1959, Indian Institute of Technology Madras (IIT Madras) is one of the premier institutes for engineering education in India. Situated in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, it boasts state-of-the-art infrastructure and research facilities. The campus fosters a vibrant student culture and offers a wide range of extracurricular activities, nurturing holistic development.

name: Indian Institute of Science
desc: Founded in 1909, the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) is renowned for its research and academic excellence. Located in Bengaluru, Karnataka, it offers a conducive environment for interdisciplinary research and collaboration. The campus houses world-class laboratories and research centers, attracting scholars and scientists from across the globe.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay
desc: Established in 1958, Indian Institute of Technology Bombay (IIT Bombay) is one of the oldest and most prestigious engineering institutes in India.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
desc: Established in 1961, Indian Institute of Technology Delhi (IIT Delhi) is renowned for its world-class faculty and research facilities. Situated in New Delhi, it offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, science, and humanities. The campus is known for its lush greenery and modern infrastructure.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur
desc: Founded in 1959, Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) is known for its rigorous academic curriculum and strong industry connections. Situated in Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, it offers a conducive environment for research and innovation, with state-of-the-art laboratories and research centers. The campus, located on the outskirts of Kanpur.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
desc: Established in 1951, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur) is one of the largest and most diversified IITs in India. Situated in Kharagpur, West Bengal, it offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, science, and humanities. The campus is known for its sprawling campus and vibrant student community.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
desc: Established in 1847 as the Thomason College of Civil Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IIT Roorkee) is known for its picturesque campus and strong alumni network. Located in Roorkee, Uttarakhand, it offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, architecture, and applied sciences.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati
desc: Established in 1994, Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati (IIT Guwahati) is located amidst the serene landscapes of Assam, offering quality education in engineering and sciences. It boasts state-of-the-art infrastructure and research facilities, attracting students and scholars from across the country.

name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi
desc: Established in 1956, All India Institute of Medical Sciences Delhi (AIIMS Delhi) is a premier medical institute offering top-notch medical education and research. Located in New Delhi, it is known for its state-of-the-art medical facilities and world-class faculty. The campus provides easy access to healthcare facilities and research opportunities.

name: Jawaharlal Nehru University
desc: Established in 1969, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) is renowned for its social sciences and humanities programs. Situated in New Delhi, it offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various disciplines. The campus is known for its vibrant student activism and intellectual atmosphere, fostering a culture of debate and discussion.
